page.content: part of an organised group. Most went for an organised group (some games such as football prevent anything else), but some preferred to play with just a best friend, and a very few preferred to play alone. Time also came into the survey when we inquired into how much time they devoted to sport. Boys spend by far the most amount of time each week playing their favourite sport, often several hours each day, with some girls playing their favourite sport just once a week. Eighty-eight percent preferred to play rather than spectate a sport, but nine percent were equally willing to do both. Overall, it was found that sport plays an important part in the leisure time of many of our youngsters.
